invoiceUpcoming.subject: Upcoming invoice
invoiceUpcoming.content:
Hello

Your subscription will be automatically renewed in 30 days. You will be charged an amount of CHF 12.-

The subscription can be cancelled at any time in the application under "Settings".

We would be delighted to be able to count you among our customers in the future.

Kind regards
Flightbook Team

welcome.subject: Welcome to Flightbook
welcome.content:
Welcome to Flightbook!

Hello {name},

Great to see you using Flightbook!

You're currently using Flightbook Free, which gives you access to all features. However, this version allows you to add only up to 25 flights.

Want more? Upgrade to Flightbook Premium for just 12 CHF per year (that's only 1 CHF per month)!

Subscribe to Flightbook Premium

By upgrading, you support the project and help cover server costs. Thank you for your support!

Enjoy using Flightbook! If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,

Yannick
